tags.name: Customer API
tags.description:
Access a customer's basic contact details. The customer may choose to share their personal or organisation details. Customer API is a consumer API. To access data you'll need the customer's consent.

Host URL

CommBank requests are passed to the URL https://secure.api.commbank.com.au/api/cds-au/v1/banking/common/customer

CBA â€“ CommBiz requests are passed to the URL https://secure.cdr.commbiz.api.commbank.com.au/cbzapi/cds-au/v1/common/customer

customerUType.description: The type of customer object that is present
The type of customer object that is present

lastUpdateTime.description: The date and time that this record was last updated by the customer.

firstName.description: For people with single names this field need not be present.

lastName.description: For people with single names the single name should be in this field.

middleNames.description: Field is mandatory but array may be empty.

suffix.description: Used for a trailing suffix to the name.

occupationCode.description:
Value is a valid ANZSCO v1.2 Standard Occupation classification.
CommBank does not currently return this value.

lastUpdateTime.description: The date and time that this record was last updated by the customer.

agentFirstName.description: The first name of the individual providing access on behalf of the organisation.

agentLastName.description: The last name of the individual providing access on behalf of the organisation.

agentRole.description: The role of the individual identified as the agent who is providing authorisation.

legalName.description:
Legal name, if different to the business name.
CommBank does not currently return this value.

shortName.description:
Short name used for communication, if different to the business name.
CommBank does not currently return this value.

abn.description: Australian Business Number for the organisation.

acn.description:
Australian Company Number for the organisation. Required only if an ACN is applicable for the organisation type.
CommBank does not currently return this value.

isACNCRegistered.description:
True if registered with the ACNC. False if not. Absent or null if not confirmed.
CommBank does not currently return this value.

industryCode.description:
[ANZSIC (2006)](http://www.abs.gov.au/anzsic) code for the organisation.
CommBank does not currently return this value.

establishmentDate.description: The date the organisation described was established.

isPreferred.description: Indication of the preferred phone number.

purpose.description: The purpose of the number as specified by the customer.

countryCode.description: If absent, assumed to be Australia (+61).

areaCode.description: The area code of the phone number.

fullNumber.description: Fully formatted phone number with country code, area code, number and extension incorporated.

isPreferred.description: Indication of the preferred email address.

purpose.description: The purpose for the email, as specified by the customer.
The purpose of the physical address.

addressUType.description: The type of address object present.

mailingName.description:
Name of the individual or business formatted address.
CommBank does not currently return this value.

addressLine1.description: First line of the standard address.

addressLine2.description: Second line of the standard address.

addressLine3.description: Third line of the standard address.

city.description: Name of the city or locality.

state.description: State in which the address belongs.

dpid.description: Unique identifier for an address as defined by Australia Post

thoroughfareNumber2Suffix.description: Suffix for the second thoroughfare number.

flatUnitType.description: Type of flat or unit for the address.

floorLevelType.description: Type of floor or level for the address.

postalDeliveryNumberPrefix.description: Postal delivery number prefix related to the postal delivery number.

postalDeliveryNumberSuffix.description: Postal delivery number suffix related to the postal delivery number.

state.description: State in which the address belongs.

CommonPAFAddress.description:
Australian address.
CommBank does not currently return this value.

errors.title: Server Error

ParamAcceptHeader.name: Accept
ParamAcceptHeader.description: Content-Type that is acceptable for the server's response.

ParamXVHeader.name: x-v
ParamXVHeader.description: Version of the API end point being requested.

ParamXMinVHeader.name: x-min-v
ParamXMinVHeader.description: Minimum version of the API end point you are requesting.

ParamXFapiInterationId.name: x-fapi-interaction-id
ParamXFapiInterationId.description: Reflects the value of the Interaction ID in the request.

ParamXFapiAuthDate.name: x-fapi-auth-date
ParamXFapiAuthDate.description: The time when the customer last logged in to the data recipient.

ParamXFapiCustomerIpAddress.name: x-fapi-customer-ip-address
ParamXFapiCustomerIpAddress.description: The customer's original IP address if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient.

ParamXCdsClientHeaders.name: x-cds-client-headers
ParamXCdsClientHeaders.description: The customer's original standard http headers encoded, including the original User Agent header, if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient.
